title: Annual Leave
description: Employees are entitled to 20 days of paid annual leave per calendar year.

faq.question: How many days of annual leave do I get?
faq.answer: You are entitled to 20 days of paid annual leave per year.

faq.question: Can I carry forward unused annual leave?
faq.answer: Up to 5 days of unused annual leave can be carried forward to the next year.

title: Working Hours
description: The standard working hours are 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM, Monday to Friday.

faq.question: What are the standard working hours?
faq.answer: Standard working hours are from 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM, Monday to Friday.

faq.question: Is remote work allowed?
faq.answer: Remote work is permitted upon manager approval and depends on your role.

title: Health Insurance
description: All full-time employees are covered under the corporate health insurance plan.

faq.question: Am I covered by health insurance?
faq.answer: Yes, all full-time employees are enrolled in the company's health insurance plan.

faq.question: Can I add my family to the health insurance?
faq.answer: Yes, you can add dependents with additional premium contributions.

title: Resignation Process
description: Employees must provide at least 30 daysâ€™ notice prior to resignation.

faq.question: How do I resign?
faq.answer: You must submit a written notice to your manager and HR at least 30 days before your intended last working day.

faq.question: Is notice period mandatory?
faq.answer: Yes, a minimum 30-day notice period is required unless waived by HR.
